article.title: Simmonds to Overhaul UH-60 Digital Computer
article.text: Simmonds Precision Products Inc., Vergennes, Vermont, was awarded a $10,304,490 firm-fixed-price contract to procure overhaul of the UH-60 aircraft digital computer. Minimum quantity is 84 with a maximum of 494. Bids were solicited via the Internet with one received. Work locations and funding will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of February 6, 2022. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W58RGZ-17-D-0024).

imgalttext.img: Simmonds Precision Products has been awarded a contract to overhaul UH-60 digital computers.
